description.narrative:
Project "A new page life # Project to promote the right to have birth certificates for children in Ho Chi Minh city" contributes in: # Raising awareness and promoting the implementation of the right to have birth certificates for children with special circumstances in Ho Chi Minh City, especially the group of children who have never been able to or cannot acquire personal identification documents due to various reasons # Mobilizing stakeholders' participation in pursuing and supporting each specific case, raising public awareness and advocacy.
Specific activities include: # Organizing training workshops on child support with birth certificates. # Developing communication activities and mobilize community participation in child support # Providingadvice and supporting organizations in issuing personal identification documents for children through direct and indirect forms such as email / phone or materials distribution. # Organizing communication activities for "Children and birth certificate" event # Organizing policy dialogue /feedback session "We have the right to have a birth certificate" # Initiating a petition to Supervisory Board of Citizenship Identity Law, Residence Law, National Assembly and related parties in supporting children with special circumstances to make birth certificates andother personal identification documents.

participating-org.narrative:
Research Center of Management and Sustainable Development (MSD) is a Vietnamese non-government organization established under SouthEast Asia Research Association Vietnam # SEARAV, according to the decision number: 53-2017 /Q#-TWH on August 16, 2017.
Mission: Asa Vietnamese non-governmental organization, MSD efforts to act for an enable environment for the development of civil society sector and to promote the rights of marginalized groups, especially children, youth, women and people with disabilities.
Vision: Our vision is a world of justice and equality, where civil society plays as an effective independent actor/ partner with their own rights and the rights of marginalized and vulnerable communities are respected.
Slogan: We create values and achieve local impact in a niche market. We work effectively and efficiently through mutual learning, inspiring and innovative intervention.
Core Values and Principles Equitable partnerships Networking and solidarity Inclusion and People empowerment Good governance Innovative intervention Objectives Empower # to build capacity for CSOs towards development effectiveness Partner # to network CSOs together and with other development actors for robust and effective partnership Enable # to promote enabling environment for civil society to do its work, and to enhance its self-development Intervene # to promote the rights of marginalised groups, especially children, youth, women and people with disabilities
Research Center of Management and Sustainable Development (MSD)
